examples.text: Though he was young, he supported his family. = He supported his family, though he was young.
examples.translatedText: 그는 어렸지만 그의 가족을 부양하고 있었다. ★ though절은 주절 앞이나 뒤에 모두 놓을 수 있음.

examples.text: We managed to have a pretty good time, though the rain kept up for almost three weeks.
examples.translatedText: 우리는 그런 대로 즐거운 시간을 보낼 수 있었다. 하긴 거의 3주일 동안 계속 비가 내렸지마는.

meanings.meaning: [문미·문중에 두어] 그러나, 그래도, 그렇지만, 하긴, 역시(however, nevertheless)

examples.text: I missed the bus. Tom gave me a ride, though.
examples.translatedText: 나는 버스를 놓쳤어, 하지만 톰이 차에 태워 주었어.

meanings.originalMeaning: [문미·문중에 두어] 그러나, 그래도, 그렇지만, 하긴, 역시(however, nevertheless)

examples.text: Though young, he has much gray hair.

examples.translatedText: 몸에 해롭다는 것을 알다가도 그만 과음하기 일쑤다
examples.text: Though I know it is bad for my health, I usually drink too much in spite of myself.
Young though he was, he was very wise.

examples.translatedText: 모처럼 왔는데 박물관이 휴관이라 매우 실망했다
examples.text: Though I came to visit the museum all the way, it was closed to my great disappointment.

examples.translatedText: 일껏 오라고 했는데 그는 안 왔다
examples.text: He did not come, though I told him to.
